data.enText: connected with the sea and the creatures and plants that live there
a marine biologist (= a scientist who studies life in the sea)
connected with ships or trade at sea
data.chText: 海船的；货船的；海上贸易的

data.enText: a soldier who is trained to serve on land or at sea, especially one in the US Marine Corps or the British Royal Marines
data.chText: （尤指美国或英国皇家）海军陆战队士兵

means: (尤指美国或英国皇家)海军陆战队士兵

tr: a soldier who serves both on shipboard and on land
native to or inhabiting the sea
example: marine plants and animals such as seaweed and whales

tr: relating to or characteristic of or occurring on or in the sea
of or relating to the sea
of or relating to military personnel who serve both on land and at sea (specifically the U.S. Marine Corps)
relating to or involving ships or shipping or navigation or seamen

value.def: A marine is a member of an armed force, for example the US Marine Corps or the Royal Marines, who is specially trained for military duties at sea as well as on land.
Marine is used to describe things relating to the sea or to the animals and plants that live in the sea.
Marine is used to describe things relating to ships and their movement at sea.
